text:
Wevat | Senior Software Engineer | London, England | ONSITE, REMOTE | https://www.wevat.com

We’re on a mission to make it really easy for international travellers to get a tax refund on their shopping in Europe, starting with the UK.

 We are small team, but looking for great engineers to help us scale - currently seeking a senior backend engineer. TL;DR of our stack: Java 8, Spring Boot, Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins, AWS.   

Check out the job description and instructions on how to apply here: https://wevat.workable.com/
